page.title: Referral Program
page.subtitle: Earn commissions on your referrals' Ludo games
page.loginRequired: Sign in to access your referral dashboard

code.title: Your Referral Code
code.shareMessage: Join me on PRYZEN with my code {{code}} and get started!

step1.title: Share your code
step1.description: Give your unique referral code to your friends

step2.title: They play Ludo
step2.description: Your referrals play Ludo games on the platform

step3.title: You earn commissions
step3.description: Get 1.5% on N1 and 0.5% on N2 of their bets

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.description: Commissions are calculated on finished games only. Withdrawals are subject to verification.
